title: April Love Geary posts adorable family photo at a pumpkin patch
text:
April Love Geary got into the spirit of fall on Saturday when she shared an adorable photo of herself alongside her family at the pumpkin patch.

The model wore a form-fitting dress in a nude color for the photo alongside fiancé Robin Thicke and daughters Mia and Lola.

'Only picture out of 100 where the kids are SEMI looking at the camera,' Geary, 24, wrote in the caption.

Picture perfect! April Love Geary got into the spirit of fall on Saturday when she shared an adorable photo of herself alongside her family - fiancé Robin Thicke and daughters Mia and Lola - at a pumpkin patch

Robin sat smiling with an arm around his wife to be, cradling daughter Mia on his lap.

April was holding little Lola, who she welcomed back in February.

The photo comes about a month after Geary and Thicke were involved in a two-car crash on a Malibu highway.

Geary was driving an Escalade with Thicke as her passenger when she collided with another car adjacent to Point Dume and Zuma Beach.

Update: The photo comes about a month after Geary and Thicke were involved in a two-car crash on a Malibu highway

The pair's Escalade almost tipped over along the side of the highway, and the other vehicle was left with a mangled hood.

No major injuries were suffered by either party and no one was taken to the hospital.

Geary and Thicke announced their engagement in December of last year after three and a half years of dating.

Thicke has made a comeback to Fox's The Masked Singer as a celebrity judge for its second season.

The R&B crooner sits alongside fellow judges Ken Jeong, Jenny McCarthy and Nicole Scherzinger, in addition to host Nick Cannon.
description: April Love Geary got into the spirit of fall on Saturday when she shared an adorable photo of herself alongside her family at the pumpkin patch.
